catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 226
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: unsigned; female figure with long, flowing hair; white outer kimono with autumn motifs of deer, chrysanthemums, pampas grass, bush clover, and maple leaves; a design of waves on the red kimono peeking through
title: Lady from the “Visiting Kawachi” Episode of the Tales of Ise
